articles.description: The Night Manager review: Hotstar's remake doesn't stray too far from the source, but a handful of strong central performances -- the cast includes Aditya Roy Kapur, Anil Kapoor, Tillotama Shome and Sobhita Dhulipala -- ensure that it's a notch above the stre…
articles.content: Strong performances and an admittedly engaging plot ensure that The Night Manager finds a spot at the top of Hotstars heap of Hindi-language remakes. But when a streamers slate itself resembles a sta… [+5450 chars]
